name: The Midnight Abductor
description:
Title: The Midnight Abductor

Platform: HTML

Genre: Text-based adventure/horror

Rating: T

Target Market: 13+, Horror fans, casual gamers

Game Overview:

Kidnapped from your home, you wake up in the house of a twisted maniac. Can you escape his house of horrors? Or will you become the next victim of the notorious Midnight Abductor?

Instructions:

Click to launch the game in full screen

Game Design Team

Kameron Eaton - Game Designer
